title: Please bring back old client
body: I am beyond sick of getting queue dodge timers because your client is beyond unstable in champ select. Admit the new client is trash and let us use the old one if we so wish.

replies.body: Too bad, it's never coming back
they got rid of the old client because it was shit and out dated maybe its your computer

the old client was not the best but at least it was functional. They removed a ton of features when they added the new client and it is much slower. The client is harder to run than the actual game now.
I tried saying the same thing but you know riot they only listen to the pro's and youtubers. also have not gotten a single response from them.
